Title: Dance
Plot: Dawson casts Jen as the new leading lady in his film, but creates a messy off-camera scene during her date at the school dance. Meanwhile, Joey confronts Mrs. Leery about her liaisons; and Pacey gets under Tamara's skin with his public flirting.
ParentalRatingReason: PG Violence, coarse language and sexual references
GuestStars: Nicole Nieth, Scott Foley, Leann Hunley, Mitchell Laurance
